item.title: Metrics from my first email update to all users
item.description: After launching Job Description AI - Professional job description generator with few clicks on Product Hunt, I spent the following three weeks fixing bugs and adding features requested by users to improve the service. I have created a notion page for releases and included a link inside the portal to present the progress to regular users, but how do I inform everyone? I decided to send my first email update to all registered users informing them about the progress in the last three weeks.
